act_pit.actname: Sexual Violence and Misconduct Policy Act

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "sexual misconduct", paragraph (g) BEFORE amended by 2023-11-30, effective January 29, 2024 (BC Reg 293/2023).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the distribution of a sexually explicit photograph or video of a person to one or more persons other than the person in the photograph or video without the consent of the person in the photograph or video and with the intent to distress the person in the photograph or video;
